meaning: She is the siddhi (accomplishment) in the accomplished beings.
commentary: Nishta means steadfast position or fixing of mind steadfast at a point. The nishta of a self realized person (muni) which is perpetually united with the Brahman is called Parānishta. Sadhana in which the mind is totally focused on the absolute is Parānishta. Self realization is Parānishta.
